name: Gravi-Gun
description:
You wake up in a facility with a weapon that can drag objects around when you trigger it. You tell yourself you should escape with it.

3 mini levels made in Unreal Engine 4.27 in just about a week for the 7dFPS 2021 game jam. Levels were made by Léo with HammUEr. Blueprints were made by Zibe.

Licensed assets:

  • "Keycard Model" (https://skfb.ly/oov8q) by SemB, CC BY.
  • "Sawblade" (https://skfb.ly/69HUy) by azzajess, CC BY.
  • Megascans by Quixel.
